page.title: 17EDUCATION CHILD'S TIMETABLE.
page.content: I wake up in the morning about 06.30,read then go downstairs and have a wash. I get dressed for school then I go outside to feed my guinea pig and check my bicycle. After breakfast at 08.05 I set off for a 0.8 km. journey to school. When I reach school I play badminton, tennis or football. At 09.05 it is assembly in the hall, then we have mathematics. Break is next when we buy crisps from the tuck shop. At 10.55 we have English and if we do it very well and finish we have free choice time until 12.30 when we go to lunch. A 13.30 we start afternoon school, on Tuesdays we have football and art. After school we have either play practice, gymnastics or football club. I then set off for home and my tea at 1 .00. I usually go to bed at 20.30.
